Good game, I approve. NEW OPERATION

First things first, do not get this game for unboxings, all because you watched your favorite youtuber unbox a ton of cool things in one video. I can promise you that will not happen to you. I'd be willing to bet valve tinkers with the system in some way or another to make those accounts a hell of a lot more likely to pull rare items. Believe me from experience, it is not worth it.
    Second, as an fps it isn't a terrible game, nor is it great. I like it because it is pure, no perks no specific advantages, you for the most part have to just outplay the opponents. There are small things you can learn to tilt the scales but it usually comes down to personal skill. The lack of cheat detection is pretty sad, but the way valve acts? "Deal with it"
   Overall, its "eh". I'm at the stage of damn near moving on. This game can be a back-burner title for me. It isn't worth being a regular IMO. But give it a shot, you might like it.
